translation.Message_0_Page_0: Hey there survivor. I'm <name_npc>. You're safe here!
translation.Message_0_Page_1: We are still looking for survivors out and around in Belgium. It's not the easiest to find them due to the zombies that stand in the way.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Could I interest you in anything to help you survive?
translation.Response_2: I will be on my way.
